channel.title: [317] Gfx, Emote, and Freeze help. [317]
channel.description:
Ok, i need some help. I want it so when you eat a certain thing, you do an emote, a gfx, and you cant move, until a certain time, or just log out, if you dont know that.
Ive tried several times but i dont think im going in the right direction.
Thanks, Wookiezz

item.title: [317] Gfx, Emote, and Freeze help. [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

case ITEMID: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(####); c.stillgfx(##, absY, absX); c.EntangleDelay = ####; break;
